title: PR police to make foolproof security arrangements on Pakistan Day
content:
LAHORE, Mar 20 (APP): Pakistan Railways Police will make foolproof security arrangements on Pakistan Day (March 23).
According to a notification issued here on Saturday, DIG Operations directed all divisional police officers to ensure strict security measures for the protection of passengers and railway properties.
On the direction of DIG, security has been beefed up at railway stations, railway properties and in trains.
